analysis.key_quote: Telling people who have dedicated years of education, work, and concern, that their only value is in their personal political allegiance to anyone, degrades everything that they bring but more, it cheats the American people out of the government that they deserve, and that they have paid for through their taxes.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and the dangers of politicization, highlighting concerns about the degradation of civil service integrity and the loss of institutional knowledge.
